message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $11,000.  This is a fair price considering its worth to me and its potential benefit to your business.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your perspective on the price, $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, however. How about $10,250? This would still provide a good value for you while allowing me to make a fair profit. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. I'm still a bit hesitant at $10,250. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. This is a bit closer to my target, and I'm willing to make a serious decision if we can meet at this price. What do you think?
